## Description {#details}

Context object for machine code objects.

This class owns all of the sections that it creates.

Definition at line 83 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccontext-h">MCContext.h</a>.

### getDwarfFile {#a3ad186547248b6c5236a8795cce3f477}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; unsigned &gt; MCContext::getDwarfFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Directory, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FileName, unsigned FileNumber, std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/md5/md5result">MD5::MD5Result</a> &gt; Checksum, std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &gt; Source, unsigned CUID)</>}>
Creates an entry in the dwarf file and directory tables.

getDwarfFile - takes a file name and number to place in the dwarf file and directory tables.

If the file number has already been allocated it is an error and zero is returned and the client reports the error, else the allocated file number is returned. The file numbers may be in any order.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccontext-h/#l00690">690</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mccontext-h">MCContext.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mccontext-cpp/#l00989">989</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mccontext-cpp">MCContext.cpp</a>.
